name: A Fine Mess
description: A moon shattered in the sky, a city destroyed and a mysterious woman in an age-old outfit, biding her time on the beach as if none had happened.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 32/64Bit Processor: 2.4GHz CPU Dual Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 / Radeon R7 260X with 1GB Memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
